examples.example: 他老是积极地帮助别人，大家都很喜欢他。

translate.english: He is always actively helping others, and everyone likes him very much.

examples.example: 他老是面带微笑，给身边的人带来温暖和快乐。

translate.english: He always has a smile on his face, bringing warmth and happiness to the people around him.

examples.example: 我的老师老是鼓励我们要勇敢追求梦想。

translate.english: My teacher always encourages us to bravely pursue our dreams.
